E2T10AU.original: ~z~The bastards didn't hurt you did they?
~z~Why don't we head out to the Carraways? It's fabulous this time of year.
E2T10AU.translated: ~z~我们去Carraways度假吧？现在是一年中最棒的时候。

E2T10AU.original: ~z~She don't got a mouth like a lady, Tone. And the way she was acting, she was gonna get us killed.
E2T10AU.translated: ~z~她张口闭口都没有女人样，Tone。她那么冲动，会害死我们的。

E2T10AU.original: ~z~Hey, man! Luis! Bro, could you get us in?
E2T10AU.translated: ~z~嘿，哥们！Luis！兄弟，能让我们进去吗？

E2T10AU.original: ~z~I don't see you doing nothing, you loud mouth witch.
E2T10AU.translated: ~z~也没见你能怎样啊，贱嘴死八婆。

E2T10AU.original: ~z~Maybe... hey, listen, you know you're a lot like me...yeah.
E2T10AU.translated: ~z~也许吧...嘿，听着，你其实很像我。

E2T10AU.original: ~z~Shit. Wait a second. Slow up, man. What have the diamonds got to do with Gracie?
E2T10AU.translated: ~z~妈的。不对啊。等一下，钻石跟Gracie有什么关系？

E2T10AU.original: ~z~Hey Brucie. Yeah, sure, Dessie - take care of them?
~z~The fucking stowaway's gone. We can go back now and get those cocksucking kidnappers now, you pussy.
E2T10AU.translated: ~z~扒船的傻逼死了。我们回去干死那帮臭鸡巴绑匪，娘炮。

E2T10AU.original: ~z~How many of those things did I take?
~z~I order you to go back there and kill them.

E2T10AU.translated: ~z~这话说的，真像赞助我的老板。

E2T10AU.original: ~z~Man, I'm going to see some vagina tonight!
~z~You sure you want to hand this stuff over?
~z~- I'm here for you, sweetie. ~n~ '- Hand over the fucking stuff.
E2T10AU.translated: ~z~－我是来救你的，宝贝。~n~－快他妈把东西交出来。

E2T10AU.original: ~z~Hey, err. Don't mention it, man. Unless you want me to kill him...
E2T10AU.translated: ~z~嘿，不客气，哥们。想我杀了他另说...

E2T10AU.original: ~z~In this day and age? Huh, idiot must think he's in a movie.
E2T10AU.translated: ~z~这年头还来这套？这傻逼当自己在拍《教父》呢？

E2T10AU.original: ~z~Those fucks kidnapped me and you did nothing.
E2T10AU.translated: ~z~这些混蛋绑架了我，而你啥也没做。

E2T10AU.original: ~z~You and Tony are a pair of impotent fucking fags.
E2T10AU.translated: ~z~你跟Tony都他妈是阳痿的死基佬。

E2T10AU.original: ~z~I'm trying to drive the boat here.
~z~You and Tony are fucking pussies. I'm gonna make sure my dad fucking has your ball...
E2T10AU.translated: ~z~你和Tony都他妈是娘炮。我必让我爹把你俩的蛋给...

E2T10AU.original: ~z~Okay, if we walk in confident, we have a good time.
E2T10AU.translated: ~z~好了，自信点走过去，就能进去玩了。

E2T10AU.original: ~z~Yo, man, Ray Bulgarin's claiming ownership and he's got some serious resources.
E2T10AU.translated: ~z~哟，哥们。Ray Bulgarin说钻石是他的，他还很不好惹。

E2T10AU.original: ~z~Why didn't you fucking kill them for me?
~z~The catch is that we've got to give up those diamonds to get her.
E2T10AU.translated: ~z~问题是想要救她，我们就得放弃钻石。

E2T10AU.original: ~z~I hope we're complying to the harbour master's regulations.
E2T10AU.translated: ~z~希望我们没有违反港口管理法。

E2T10AU.original: ~z~Great exchange, Luis. It was meant to be peaceful.
~z~Maybe we should think about handing them over to him.
E2T10AU.translated: ~z~要么我们考虑一下把钻石给他？

E2T10AU.original: ~z~I never thought seeing you would make things feel more heterosexual.
E2T10AU.translated: ~z~这次看见你我反而觉得氛围没那么基了。

E2T10AU.original: ~z~Give me a fucking gun! Gimme a motherfucking iron!
E2T10AU.translated: ~z~给老娘来把枪！给老娘来把家伙！

E2T10AU.original: ~z~All risk and no reward. Perfect. Thanks, T.
E2T10AU.translated: ~z~累死累活还没半点好是吧。好棒棒哦，谢谢您嘞，T。

E2T10AU.original: ~z~Her father's going to kill us if we don't.
E2T10AU.translated: ~z~不给的话就要被她爹干掉了。

E2T10AU.original: ~z~Shoot this fucking prick. Pop him in the head, Luis.
~z~Those fucks should be dead, not Tony. You are pathetic, Luis.
E2T10AU.translated: ~z~该死的是那帮混蛋，不是Tony。你真可悲，Luis。

E2T10AU.original: ~z~she could walk before. She didn't need a wheelchair or anything. Look, I was just checking to make sure you weren't gay, bro.
E2T10AU.translated: ~z~之前她能走路，不用坐轮椅。听着，我只是想确认下你是不是基佬，兄弟。

E2T10AU.original: ~z~Or we give them over to the kidnappers. Gracie lives and we take our chances with the Russian.
E2T10AU.translated: ~z~要么交给绑匪，救回Gracie，我们跟老毛子赌一把。

E2T10AU.original: ~z~Yes, yes I know, but that's just your thing man...look, you know...I...err...
E2T10AU.translated: ~z~对，对，我知道，但这就是你的魅力所在。听着，那个...我...

E2T10AU.original: ~z~Hey, so I'm going to get the drinks.
~z~God, I hope so. They're getting the diamonds for her, so they better behave.
E2T10AU.translated: ~z~天，但愿如此吧。他们要用人质换钻石，最好不会变卦。

E2T10AU.original: ~z~You're a bodyguard, aren't you? Go back and kill them for me.
E2T10AU.translated: ~z~你是保镖对吧？给我回去杀了他们。

E2T10AU.original: ~z~This is true. Maybe we should be worrying about what Ray Bulgarin has to say about handing over the ice.
E2T10AU.translated: ~z~是这样。我们还是担心下交出钻石后Ray Bulgarin的想法吧。

E2T10AU.original: ~z~He let go. Now turn around and get those assholes who kidnapped me, you pussy.
E2T10AU.translated: ~z~甩掉他了。赶紧回去干掉绑架我的操蛋玩意，娘炮。

E2T10AU.original: ~z~I don't give a fuck who you think you are. You're not coming in.
E2T10AU.translated: ~z~我才不管你以为自己是谁。你不能进去。

E2T10AU.original: ~z~We got two options, Lou. Either we give them to the Russian, and Ancelotti kills us.
E2T10AU.translated: ~z~现在就两条路，Lou。要不交给老毛子，被Ancelotti家族追杀。

E2T10AU.original: ~z~Gracie, you're gonna have to shut the fuck up right now. We don't need to be doing this for you.
E2T10AU.translated: ~z~Gracie，你他妈还是闭嘴吧。我们没必要来救你的。

E2T10AU.original: ~z~Not a problem, man. I've got to go.
~z~Fuck me, Tone. After all that shit. I know how much they cost.
E2T10AU.translated: ~z~我操，Tone。一番波折下来，我也知道这批钻石的价值。

E2T10AU.original: ~z~Not really, bro. I like killing for money.
E2T10AU.translated: ~z~没有的事。我杀人是为了赚钱。

E2T10AU.original: ~z~We put the ice in the middle.
~z~Tony, you're fucking pathetic. Get the motherfucker off our boat!
E2T10AU.translated: ~z~Tony，你他妈个废物，快把这个王八弄下去！

E2T10AU.original: ~z~I know you've been through a lot of shit, Gracie, but you're acting like a real bitch. Tony's gone, so get outta here.
E2T10AU.translated: ~z~我知道你受苦了，Gracie，但你这样真的像个婊子。Tony已经死了，那你快滚吧。

E2T10AU.original: ~z~You're a fucking joke. You and that old queen are gonna be done here wh...
E2T10AU.translated: ~z~你他妈是个笑话。你和那个大基佬死定...

E2T10AU.original: ~z~Why didn't you fucking kill them you fucking nothing?
E2T10AU.translated: ~z~你他妈怎么没干掉他们，废物吧你？

E2T10AU.original: ~z~That's right you're like a lone wolf. An adventurer. Tough, but with a sensitive side.
E2T10AU.translated: ~z~没错，你像一匹孤狼，一个探险者。强硬，但有感性的一面。

E2T10AU.original: ~z~- Hey, Dess.~n~ - Hey, man. ~n~ - Tony in? ~n~ - I ain't seen him.
~z~Hey, Luis. Come on, man. We gotta go. Let's go!
~z~You stupid fucking bouncer piece of shit, go back and get the guys who kidnapped me.
E2T10AU.translated: ~z~你他妈个傻逼看门的，快回去把绑架我的人干了。

E2T10AU.original: ~z~He can't hear you, babe. Tone's in a world of his own.
E2T10AU.translated: ~z~他听不到的，宝贝。Tone已经神游天外了。

E2T10AU.original: ~z~Whoa. Someone tell Gracie to chill the fuck out.
~z~Hey, I fucked three girls last night, man. One of them can't even walk.
E2T10AU.translated: ~z~嘿，昨晚我操了三个娘们，哥们。其中一个路都不会走了。

E2T10AU.original: ~z~Listen, can I just say, the way you dealt with Mori man?
E2T10AU.translated: ~z~听着，我想讲一下，你上次对付Mori的那套。

E2T10AU.original: ~z~Hey there, muscles, no need to hit a lady.
~z~Oh great. Angry mobsters, kidnappers, maniacs. Sounds like another fun day.
E2T10AU.translated: ~z~绝了。暴怒黑帮、乡下绑匪、疯子成群，又是美好的一天。

E2T10AU.original: ~z~Alright, man. Sounds like you got everything figured out.
E2T10AU.translated: ~z~行吧，看来你已经洞察一切了。

E2T10AU.original: ~z~Oh, oh wait a minute man, we're relatively important people. We're goin' in, bro!
E2T10AU.translated: ~z~等下，哥们，我们可是相当重要的人。放我们进去，兄弟！

E2T10AU.original: ~z~I mean, you're the one who just got ambushed by some crazy Russians because of them!
E2T10AU.translated: ~z~再说，你就是因为钻石才被那个毛子阴了的！

E2T10AU.original: ~z~We ain't gonna have much in the bank after we hand over these diamonds.
E2T10AU.translated: ~z~钻石交出去，我们剩下的资产就不多了。

E2T10AU.original: ~z~The exchange is on Charge Island. They're coming by land, we're on the water.
E2T10AU.translated: ~z~人质交易定在Charge岛进行。他们走陆路，我们走水路。

E2T10AU.original: ~z~Hey, wait listen, can I just say something, man?
~z~Tone, pull it together. Gracie didn't make it.
~z~It's cool, man. Just don't do it again, man.
~z~Come on, man, I'm a VIP. We come here all the time.
E2T10AU.translated: ~z~拜托，老兄，我可是VIP。我们天天来的。

E2T10AU.original: ~z~Gracie will soon be free, thanks to us.
~z~Good seeing you guys, man, I gotta go take care of something.
E2T10AU.translated: ~z~很高兴见到你们。我要去忙了。

E2T10AU.original: ~z~I need my pills, Lou. I can't take it.
~z~Why send a fucking homo to do a man's job?
E2T10AU.translated: ~z~怎么派了个基佬来干男人的事？

E2T10AU.original: ~z~Mission aborted. You think they'll kill Gracie when we don't show?
E2T10AU.translated: ~z~任务中止。要是我们没到场，他们会不会杀了Gracie？

E2T10AU.original: ~z~Nothing! I didn't mean nothing by it. I'm not gay.
E2T10AU.translated: ~z~没有！我没别的意思。我不是基佬。

E2T10AU.original: ~z~I'm going to pretend I didn't hear that sweetheart.
E2T10AU.translated: ~z~那我要装作没听到这句话，宝贝。

E2T10AU.original: ~z~and we wouldn't be doing this if old man Ancelotti hadn't "made me an offer I couldn't refuse".
E2T10AU.translated: ~z~要不是Ancelotti头子给了我一个「无法拒绝的提议」，我才不干。

E2T10AU.original: ~z~I got nothing figured out. Half the city wants to kill me,
E2T10AU.translated: ~z~我洞察个屁啊，半个自由城的人都在追杀我。

E2T10AU.original: ~z~It's your ass on the line too, Lou. That's what business partner means.
E2T10AU.translated: ~z~你也是一条船上的，Lou。这就是合伙人的责任。

E2T10AU.original: ~z~You mean taking her back? Or this gonna be tranquilo?
E2T10AU.translated: ~z~你是说带她回来？不用起冲突？

E2T10AU.original: ~z~Apparently the kidnappers have asked for these rocks and we aren't being given much of a choice about it,
E2T10AU.translated: ~z~绑匪是冲着钻石来的，我们显然也没得选。

E2T10AU.original: ~z~Get this fucking chump off our boat.
~z~The rocks've got us in enough shit. Let's forget about the bottom line for a second.
E2T10AU.translated: ~z~钻石净给我们惹麻烦，先别管资金链的事了。

E2T10AU.original: ~z~I think they want the ice, T. They ain't gonna hurt her.
E2T10AU.translated: ~z~他们不会放弃钻石的，T。不可能伤害她的。

E2T10AU.original: ~z~Sponsor, bodyguard, business advisor, fucking guru. I'm here to keep you out of trouble, Tony. Just listen to me, yo.
E2T10AU.translated: ~z~赞助商、保镖、商业顾问、指导。我需要帮你减少麻烦，Tony。听我的吧。

E2T10AU.original: ~z~That motherfucker's on our boat. Fucking pop him.
E2T10AU.translated: ~z~那个傻逼扒在船上，快崩了他。

E2T10AU.original: ~z~You got Gracie back safe and sound, Tone. I hope she was worth 2 mil'.
E2T10AU.translated: ~z~你把Gracie完完整整地带回来了，Tone。希望她对得起两百万。

E2T10AU.original: ~z~Yeah, well, those kidnapping bitches don't deserve peaceful. Fuck 'em, T.
E2T10AU.translated: ~z~是吗，这些天杀的绑匪不配和平。操他妈的，T。

E2T10AU.original: ~z~I can't imagine how dirty that water is. Blah!
~z~Hey we ain't getting into no wood chipper shit out here, bitch. Chill!
E2T10AU.translated: ~z~喂，我们可不兴绞肉机这套啊，贱人。冷静点！

E2T10AU.original: ~z~Where is my daddy? He'd have killed every last one of them.
E2T10AU.translated: ~z~我爹在哪里？换他早就把他们杀光了。

E2T10AU.original: ~z~We need to get over to Charge Island, Luis. They're expecting us to dock there.
E2T10AU.translated: ~z~我们要去Charge岛，Luis。他们要求在那里交易。

E2T10AU.original: ~z~I should have given her some pills. But, oops, Haha! I took 'em all.
E2T10AU.translated: ~z~我应该给她嗑点药的。但是呢，哈哈！我全嗑完了。

E2T10AU.original: ~z~We leave, and you pick up the stuff.
~z~Wait a minute, man, you'll need your full facilities for this exchange.
E2T10AU.translated: ~z~等等，哥们，交易的时候可不能神志不清啊。

E2T10AU.original: ~z~Whatever you did, at least she shut up. Peace at last.
E2T10AU.translated: ~z~不管怎样，至少她闭嘴了。终于安宁了。

E2T10AU.original: ~z~I am not in the mood for this.
~z~I want you to make this prick fucking suffer. Feed him to the rotors.
E2T10AU.translated: ~z~给这个混账吃点苦头，用螺旋桨弄死他。

E2T10AU.original: ~z~She can't speak, we got a gag in her mouth.
E2T10AU.translated: ~z~她回答不了，嘴被我们堵上了。

E2T10AU.original: ~z~Yeah, lends a lot of clarity to my thinking.
~z~You don't know half what we been through for you, bitch, so shut the fuck up.
E2T10AU.translated: ~z~你压根就不知道我们为你付出了多少，贱逼。闭嘴吧你。

E2T10AU.original: ~z~I know. One man's tradition is another man's worn out cliché.
~z~She had a boating accident. Make sure her old man understands that. I don't want to see her again.
E2T10AU.translated: ~z~她在船上撞到了，你让他爹理解一下。我不想再看见她了。

E2T10AU.original: ~z~We're getting Gracie back. She's coming home.
~z~but they'll be lucky if they can get a chance before I die of a heart attack.
E2T10AU.translated: ~z~不过能在我犯心脏病断气之前杀了我就算他们走运。

E2T10AU.original: ~z~I don't care what he has to say. We paid for it fair. His beef's with the chef.
E2T10AU.translated: ~z~我才不管他的想法。我们付了钱的，算账找那厨子。

E2T10AU.original: ~z~What the fuck have we got to do with Gracie? Shouldn't her old man be handling this?
E2T10AU.translated: ~z~我们跟Gracie又有什么关系？这不是她老爹的事吗？
